Reviews.Title: If you have an issue, you're on your own.
Reviews.Author: Disappointed Customer
Reviews.Content: Coby Electronics "customer Support" seems to think that all of their units have NO DRIVER SOFTWARE. Actually, ALL of them do. There is some sort of driver software that is required for any piece of hardware to communicate with a PC's software. Apparently, theirs operates on black magic. I have a MID7042 that doesn't connect to four different computers. Each computer attempts to download the "driver software" that Coby Electronics believes to be a myth, but then says that it was unable to. The computers' device managers get a CODE 10. This basically means, driver software missing, or corrupted. Coby Electronics customer support rep., "None of our devices use driver software." Really? None of them? Well definitely not this one. That's why it doesn't work. Thanks for nothing Coby, and Amazon for letting products like this slide. Can't even transfer a single document to or from this piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: works....
Reviews.Author: Maxx Creese "maxximuscree"
Reviews.Content: what you see is what you getpro- good os,, solid apps and  can use android appscons- flimsy not solid like its  previous incarnation, no google play or amazon apps and you have to hunt for the specific app to work it.

Reviews.Title: fully satisfied
Reviews.Author: Francesco
Reviews.Content: i am fully satisfied with purchases. Everything was as described. I suggest it to other who want to buy it.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: Monstruos 0809
Reviews.Content: Our kids love it, Awesome product, good finished, easy to use, light and resistance a kid 3 year old use.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the money
Reviews.Author: Paul N
Reviews.Content: You can’t use goggle apps with it, but you can use Amazon apps so it is okay. The Kindle app wks great with it but the Amazon app crashes a lot I saved a bower page so I can reload whenever I need it. It is not the best touch screen but it works. I agree with the people who say its okay for a first tablet.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: Missy Quinn
Reviews.Content: my 12 year old sister bought this and it is perfect for her! she couldnt afford an ipad cleary becasue they are expensive but this was perfect for her

Reviews.Title: Please do not buy ..invest in nexus 7
Reviews.Author: Vkevs
Reviews.Content: The Tablet does not have bluetooth ...no biggiedoes not have google play store... you can hack it onit was alright for 2 months and then the touch screen started spazing out and now it is 100% unuseblePlease just get a real tablet not this crap

Reviews.Title: tablet very complet
Reviews.Author: diobel
Reviews.Content: excellente good performance, large capacitygood performance, large capacity, is cheap but with good capacity and performance for many applications downloading

Reviews.Title: Coby Kryos 7inch tablet 4.0 4gb 16:9 capacitive
Reviews.Author: R. Kinney
Reviews.Content: I like my tablet. It is easier to travel with and convenient most times.  I still have not learn to us all the good features on it.  I am learning.  Once I do,  I will love it.

Reviews.Title: No more Amazon App store
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Thanks to new compatibility issues, owing to updates to the Amazon App Store, they are no longer compatible.  You can't use the Amazon App store on this tablet (the 7042).  You are stuck with Get Jar (which is lame beyond belief).  After getting this as a gift for my daughter for Christmas, it's a paperweight.  So, I'm returning it, and I'll find another tablet.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it!
Reviews.Author: Monifa K. Randolph
Reviews.Content: Sent it back!  Connection was to slow and screen to hard to pick up on finger movement. I decided to stay with and order anothe kindle fire.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros is a great tablet
Reviews.Author: Kevin C. Ortiz Soto "Kevin cristopher"
Reviews.Content: everything work perfect and the cost was great. This coby tablet was a excelent deal and i can use it with my hard drive

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Denise
Reviews.Content: I bought the Coby tablet because of the price and facilities the product offer. I just need to know how to use all the facilities.

Reviews.Title: It is OK
Reviews.Author: Frederick Campbell
Reviews.Content: The tablet is designed so that you cannot use the google ap store and so the downloadable aps are very limited. The case that was suggested with the keyboard will not work with the tablet. The touch screen is not very sensitive and sometimes you have to press pretty hard or pres several times for it to recognize. It functions ok otherwise but it is not as good as I thought it would be for the price. It just shows that price does not determine ease of use sand quality.

Reviews.Title: Need more Apps
Reviews.Author: Don B
Reviews.Content: Can't get Google Play Apps and have trouble with Amazon Apps Store as well!  Getjar doesn't provide enough free apps for our purpose.

Reviews.Title: For the price you can't beat it
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: If you want a simple tablet this fits the bill. No it is not the fastest thing out there but if you want something for email, FB, watching movies, a few games, reading books, and the simple normal tablet functions this works great. The only thing that does suck is the fact that Google Play store doesn't want to work on it (even rooted) without a different ROM installed.. at least you can get the Amazon Market or just find Samsung Gal Tablet APK's and you are good to go

Reviews.Title: No complaints.
Reviews.Author: Anthony Cherny
Reviews.Content: After buying the previous model for my wife I decided to buy this model for myself. It's not an iPad but, for me it's a fine addition to my digital gadgetry.

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware!
Reviews.Author: J. Levi Owens "The Dirty Duke"
Reviews.Content: If you are dead set on wasting money, burn it instead of buying this piece of junk; it freezes constantly, and it's manufacturer is not supported for Flash, GooglePlay, and several other "essential" apps; and you do not have access to the common Android App Store; you get some off-brand piece of junk called "GetJar"; I researched hard and didn't want to spend a fortune for my first tablet purchase; I made a bad, bad decision.

Reviews.Title: Na-da on this product
Reviews.Author: Thomas Legge
Reviews.Content: This product is a total piece of crap - PERIOD!!  I've had it for about 9 months and my patience has completely reached it's limit!!! If there was a brick wall near by this unit would be in 1,000 pieces by now!!  Oh it's great, if you don't mind 5 minute web page to page downloads, or that it constantly asks if you want to "wait for page to load or shut-down" every 10 seconds!! I'm amazed that Amazon allows this product to be sold on their internet page!!  Do NOT waste your hard earned money on this piece of junk!!!

Reviews.Title: VERY limited use
Reviews.Author: Daniel Duvall
Reviews.Content: App store has awful selection. Some apps are incompatible. A tablet is only as good as the apps it can run, and frankly this one can only play angry birds and that's about it.

Reviews.Title: Its an entry tablet
Reviews.Author: J. Ramos "Still learning..."
Reviews.Content: It shows and you get what you pay for. It works for basic tasks and the small stuff but that is about it. I needed this to travel and entertain our kids on the plane and works for that.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: san
Reviews.Content: No problem, have a loot of thing, a charguer cable, usb and others that I don't know use it. Good dimension, very similar to SG. But programs to download are little different that I know it

Reviews.Title: NO WORK
Reviews.Author: Thuan Tran
Reviews.Content: This product is very very bad. I bought it and used it one time and NO work anymore.Everyone do NOT BUY this product, please.

Reviews.Title: 4 Months later..
Reviews.Author: Cassandra
Reviews.Content: After only owning this tablet for about 4 months and using it very lightly the screen went crazy. When i try to put in my password the number pad starts putting in all these numbers and not allowing my to erase them. The tablet is pretty much useless to me now.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Eugene Ludlum
Reviews.Content: I originally bought this to save a couple bucks. Streaming video locks up about half the time. It's not the internet because my computer has no problem with it. The touch screen is a bit off. Want to go fast forward... oops just stopped the video. Open another tab...oops you just closed the window. This is annoying. Avoid this. Get a lap top.

Reviews.Title: Coby Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Upset
Reviews.Content: I usually don't review products I've bought. However I thought I'd share my experience with Coby tablet repairs. The speakers quit working on my Coby tablet after 32 days Amazon couldn't help because more than 30 days had passed. I called Coby and was told repairs would be less than 30 days. I returned the tablet to Coby they recevied it on 10-9-2012 today is 12-12 2012. I started calling Coby once a week after 30 days their reply has always been the same; tablet was shipped 2 days ago. I called today 62 days after I returned the tablet for a less than 30 day repair and got their usual reply the tablet shipped 2 days ago. If you buy a Coby product and need factory service I hope your experence is better than mine.

Reviews.Title: 4GB, Really?
Reviews.Author: Slim Fit Classic
Reviews.Content: I had purchased this for reading and editing files (PDF) purposes only.Cons.:* Crashed too often.* Not enough memory.* A bit too heavy for my own taste.* Had problems with apps.  Wouldn't run.I believe this is more an expensive toy for a spoiled kid.

Reviews.Title: Well, not the best desition I ever made.
Reviews.Author: ROLANDO PEREZ RETANA
Reviews.Content: I got a HDMI cable, but the HDMI option does NOT exist, i tried to contact cobyusa.com, but they have a fake support email where all the emails are "Undeliverable".I have the impression that this people only sell garbage massively and then dont answer for the products.After a 7 weeks using it, inside the office, I dont even take it outside, the screen went white, it is not longer working.I think the price is fair if you know you will have to throw it away in a few weeks, it is one of the worst things I ever got.I dont recomend it.

Reviews.Title: Crappy
Reviews.Author: Stacy
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet thinking that because it was android powered I would have access to the android marketplace (Google Play) allowing me to access all of my apps that I have on my cell phone. I was disappointed to find out that the app store is GetJar. - which i've never heard of, I couldn't get Facebook, pinterest, Pandora or some of my favorite games. The tablet runs slow and the screen doesn't respond to some of the touches. The games that you can download do look good but overall disappointed. I considered keeping this tablet and giving it to our 9 year old to play with but then realized she would be equally frustrated with it. I'm going to try to return it and purchase the samsung galaxy tablet. Oh, and I couldn't even read my books from kindle or kobo on this tablet I had to only use their provided ereader app, but it didn't have some titles that I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Over all, a very good tablet
Reviews.Author: Jana Wolf "Jana26"
Reviews.Content: I do like this tablet.  I was new to the tablet world so I didn't know what to expect.  I wanted this tablet mainly for surfing the web, emails, reading books, watching DVD's, and word processing specifically for when I'm not at home.  I do travel and wanted to watch DVD's while on the airplane as well as reading books.  The problem as I see it with the tablet when considering what I wanted it for was the 4 GB.  That really isn't very much and, since the external SD card can't be used for a lot, the 4 GB gets used up fast.  I thought I would be able to put digital movies on the external SD so as not to use up the internal space but, at least with the ultraviolet (Flixster) ones, you can't do that.  The Flixster program won't allow it to be used on the external SD (I contacted them to verify this!).  True, you can delete movies and then download them again if you want but that isn't the most convenient.  Also, it has made me leery of trying to add too many more apps.  I did want to get the ThinkFree Office program to create documents, etc. but I don't know if I will have the room on the 4 GB internal SD for that as well as a movie.  Priorities...That really is my only complaint.  This tablet starts up fast, it changes websites fast, the battery lasts a long time, and I love the size.  Speaking of the battery, I was able to watch a 2 1/2 hour movie and only used up about half the battery charge.  The screen is shiny and lights glare on it so it wasn't that great at watching movies on a plane or reading (I had to keep moving the tablet to avoid the glare) at first.  Once I put on the anti glare film, all was good.  That solved that problem.7-31-13.  Well, sad to say but now the touch screen isn't responding.  I tried resetting it and everything. I think it might be a loose wire and, since it's still under warranty, I tried contacting Coby. Their website says you must call Customer Service before returning a product but when you call Customer Service, it tells you to go to the website and then hangs up on you.  I tried emailing the tech support as well as customer service but never heard anything back.  So I did some googling.  Apparently they are not doing so well. They lost a law suit and have laid off most of their staff.  I hope that's not correct but, based on the lack of response, etc. I kinda think they are going belly up.  Very sad.  Now I just gotta figure out where I can go to get it fixed that won't cost an arm and a leg.  Maybe I can do it myself???

Reviews.Title: android
Reviews.Author: D. Roxborough
Reviews.Content: nice item just the job, would recommmendit to any body, cant praise it enough evidently , would certainly buy another

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros 7-Inch 4.0 ICS
Reviews.Author: MoveLikeThis73
Reviews.Content: This is actually a good tablet. Fit and finish were excellent. The android 4.0 ICS is really cool, easy to operate, and is very fast. I was able to install all the apps I needed from the Amazon app store. I even got Skype to work on it. Overall this is a great tablet to surf the web, listen to music, play games, and e-mail with. I actually had to send it back though due to a popping sound when I used ear phones. I tried 3 different pairs of ear phones and got the same result, so I sent it back. Overall a great product at a great price.

Reviews.Title: rewiew of Coby MID7042-4
Reviews.Author: jam
Reviews.Content: I found the tablet to be a little slow however expected that. I do like the fact it has expandable memory and has a HDMI connection. I can do almost anything I need with this tablet but have found that some apps will not work like netflex. As I understand, this product is not "on the list" for particular popular apps. This is the reason I only give it an average rating at its best.

Reviews.Title: NO GOOD
Reviews.Author: ANDY
Reviews.Content: THIS ITEM KEEPS SHUTTING OFF BY ITSELF IT ALSO IS VERY SLOW . IT TAKES LONG TO LOAD AND STICKS VERY OFTEN YOU HAVE TO KEEP RESETTING IT . OVERALL THIS PRODUCT IS NOT SO GREAT AS I THOUGHT IT WAS .

Reviews.Title: From OK to bad. You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: B. S. Sanchez
Reviews.Content: I was in the market for a cheap tablet for entertainment purposes, thought the black Friday deal on this was quite a steal but boy was I wrong. I did not mind the whole Google Play missing dilemma as I found substitutes (Amazon Appstore and 1mobile market),the big problem was that less than a week into using it the DC power input already broke. Without a way to charge the device I had to send it back for a refund. I have never owned a device with such shoddy construction that it broke in less than a week of purchase. I would be cautious about purchasing this product if your looking for something reliable/longterm.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed.
Reviews.Author: John Curtis "jgcurtis"
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for only one job. I use it to monitor an IP wireless security camera at our front door and feed the HDMI video to the 50 inch flat screen in our family room. It does the job nicely except for a couple of issues.It will run my IP CAM Viewer Basic application for 5 to 10 days and then it will freeze. I rebooted it a few times which is a nuisance but tolerable for the time being. The last time I rebooted it had lost the application. I had to download it again.I find the unit to be unfriendly to me. Normally on my other devices, I am happy with the touch performance and the OS layout. For example, after I down loaded the afore mentioned app, no icon appeared on the home page. I found it on the list of previous apps used. Haven't found out how to move to home page. I am sure it's simple but the operating manual is tiny with type that requires my old eyes to use a magnifying glass. It was the cheapest I found with HDMI output. It also has a limited app store compared to Google "Play Store".Curious to note, I have another 9" tablet monitor (Pandigital Novel R90L200) running the same app. It crashes on schedule every five days. The resistive touch screen seems primitive. I would never use it for anything except the monitor function. Almost unusable. But it was cheap. You get what you pay for. It also has four unmarked buttons at the bottom like other units but NO MARKING.I have another 7" tablet made by Lenovo Lenovo Ideapad A1 22282EU 7-Inch Tablet (Black), haven't used it much but seemed better than both above. It doesn't have an HDMI output.Will have to try Amazon's offerings.

Reviews.Title: Great for what it does, inexcusable for what it doesn't
Reviews.Author: Rob "Rob6610"
Reviews.Content: The Coby Kyros MID7042-4 is a great, inexpensive tablet that is responsive and easy to use, but before you can use it you have to add some apps; many will find it refreshing to get an Android device without all the clutter, but some of that clutter is useful.  When you try to add apps you'll discover that without a custom ROM you can't use Google Play and you can't add any Google-specific apps, like those for Gmail or Google Reader, so you'll have to make do with what you can find on GetJar and Amazon, which is admittedly a lot to make do with, but if you have something you love on your Android phone you may have to do some digging to find it for your Kyros, if it's even available.  Some apps won't work with the Kyros or won't work well - I've spent weeks trying to get Astrid to work properly; it works, after a fashion, but I can't use the voice input or sync it with Google Tasks, so it's just short of pointless.Aside from that the Kyros is a very good tablet and a pleasure to use for watching movies or reading and for the price it's hard to beat.  [NOTE:  I wrote this after buying the tablet for about $110, not $150+]A note about shipping:My tablet arrived on the very next business day after I placed the order, even though I asked for standard shipping; there was a slight imperfection on the screen so I sent it back and got a nice note of apology and a replacement tablet within three business days!

Reviews.Title: Not worth a penny
Reviews.Author: Davit
Reviews.Content: I haven't seen all the tablets but I think this is the worst of them, you must hit the screen with the hammer in order to type anything, you must wait for a century for app to get running. After one week from purchase the home button and the screen lock stopped working. You cant link this device to your google account, you cant even check your Gmail with the gmail app. I'm not mentioning the medieval screen resolution, my calculator has the better resolution than this. The only thing I've found pretty good is the Ice cream sandwich Android, but it cant work properly with this lousy processor and the RAM memory.Do not waste your money on this.

Reviews.Title: Coby is fantastic
Reviews.Author: juanita
Reviews.Content: hello. i from venezuela.this tablet is so very good, is small and fast 100%. good product congratulations..grettings..Excelente producto pequeño confiable y muy rapido facil uso. totalmente recomendado..  muy buen precio economico en comparación con otras tablets.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Screen. Good 4 kids I guess.
Reviews.Author: J. Bowser "J.K. Bowser"
Reviews.Content: I got this last week and by the end of the day I decided to return it. The screen is terrible. The resolution just doesn't cut it. I wasn't expecting anything close to HD but I wasn't expecting it to be that bad. I did like the build of the tablet though there was way too much bezel. Having ICS was nice as well and there was little lag. However, I would avoid this unless you need a cheap tablet for kids to watch videos.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE!!!
Reviews.Author: letf79
Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE PRODUCTO LO RECOMIENDO!!! CALIDAD Y BUEN PRECIO!!! FUNCIONA MUY BIEN!!!BUEN EQUIPO ADAPTADO A LAS NECESIDADES DE CUALQUIER PERSONA!!!

Reviews.Title: Unit NOT new
Reviews.Author: DaleW
Reviews.Content: This is the second Coby MID7042 that I have bought from Amazon. The first was for me and then my wife wanted one. I decided to get her the same model. I ordered it Saturday and it arrived Monday - Amazon Prime is great.I opened the shipping box and the one seal on the box for the tablet was broken. I opened it and everything was in the box (based on what was in my unit) but it was not packaged the same as a new unit. The adapter cords, manual, and other papers were all in a zip-lock bag. The AC adapter was not even in a bag. The tablet itself was in a bag but it was not sealed.The unit looked new (no scratches or fingerprints on the screen) and it had been reset to a "factory" reset.I did turn it on and downloaded some apps for my wife and all appears to be working.It is one thing to knowingly buy a refurbished unit but to by something marketed as "new" you expect it to be new.The 2 stars is not for the produce but for Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Loved it!
Reviews.Author: Marcinha
Reviews.Content: I received when they told me I was supposed to be receiving. Satisfied with it and I will buy more!

Reviews.Title: ok for inexpensive tablet
Reviews.Author: kradz
Reviews.Content: Wish the camera faced out too. Can only take pictures of your self :-( otherwise seems to work good  bought for Christmas for my 10 yr old so its a value I believe

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: kim
Reviews.Content: very good product, works great. my son loves it.i only wish you could get google play on it so you can download more game apps.

Reviews.Title: Its ok
Reviews.Author: gwen
Reviews.Content: This tablet works just fine with me its kinda slow though but it serves its purpose  I wanted to search internet read books I have kindle on it ... lots of music the bad this g no fb app

Reviews.Title: decent tablet for the money
Reviews.Author: Marios Tziarris "mariaras"
Reviews.Content: I would give 4 stars if it wasn't for the fact that amazon appstore does NOT work outside the US.  Got the Coby for my nephew that lives overseas and he cannot use amazon appstore (a much better android appstore than getjar) outside the US.WiFi performance is not the best.  Other than that, this is a good tablet for the money.  If I could install Google Play without installing a custom ROM (voiding the warranty) I would give this 5+ stars.

Reviews.Title: Compra Tablet COBY
Reviews.Author: Gerson
Reviews.Content: Muchas gracias por el producto suministrado. El aparato electrónico llego en buen estado. La comunicación del estatus en donde se transportaba fue informativo y claro

Reviews.Title: Nice cheap tablet
Reviews.Author: Jorge E. Correa
Reviews.Content: It is a very good tablet considering its low price with access to several apps markets. Connection to usb and sd card gives alternative uses and storage

Reviews.Title: Somewhat disappointed
Reviews.Author: the buggser
Reviews.Content: I just returned this product, and although I suppose it delivered what it advertised, I decided it's not for me.My basic disappointment is with screen size.  I didn't realize it beforehand, but I'm not real comfortable with a 7 inch screen, and I'll probably end up purchasing an Android tablet with a larger screen size.Coby Kyros has this basic model in larger screen sizes, so those are possibilities.  However, I think I'll research some other brands, including Kindle Fire and Archos.Overall reaction - the Coby Kyros 7-Inch Android is probably OK, but, mainly because of screen size, it wasn't for me.Also, I'm grateful for Amazon's more than reasonable return policy.

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: Carolina Fernandez "carofdez"
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy the product, it is very easy to use and fits my needs. It's the perfect size to carry around and I can easily access my favorite apps.

Reviews.Title: coby kyros 7 inch touch screen tablet
Reviews.Author: Lady K
Reviews.Content: The Coby Kyros 7 inch touch screen tablet is good. The only problem is google doesn't have an agreement with coby, but overall its a really good tablet.

Reviews.Title: So far so good...
Reviews.Author: Vance E. Dietz
Reviews.Content: So far so good.. Except very small print on web sites, Old eyes not good for that, they say tap screen twice to enlarge image, works at times on some sites.. Battery life NOT even close to specs, you need to be wired to power to read a book for longer than 3-4 hours then recharge, they claim 11-hrs.. They probably had a long nap between start and finish.. WI-FI works well.. ebooks stored on MicroSD duplicate themselves in internal memory when read by onboard ALDIKO ereader app, making MicroSD useless for that function..This page indicates I am reviewing a Coby MID7024-4, What I got was Coby MID7033 sans camera, Not sure why I was asked to review MID7024-4..

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros
Reviews.Author: Theresa A. Robison "therob"
Reviews.Content: I appreciate the Kyros and I like the fast speed when on the internet for downloading and the ability to find apps easily. The only thing I found was that if the wyfy is left on even when it is off it will run down the battery, but if wyfy is turned off before the device is turned off the battery will last better. Overall for the price is is a good device.

Reviews.Title: pleasently  surprised !
Reviews.Author: mbas0507
Reviews.Content: Just  to let  you know  that  i am  very  imporessed  with the  performance  and  touch  quality  of  this product,  i  think  one  of  the main reassons is  because  it  has  1 gb ram,  THAT  IS  A BIG  DIFFERENCE  AGAIN OTHERS . touch  response  is  very  very  accurate,  i really  recommend  this product  to any  kind  of  user,  also  the perfect  deal  got  to be a 9" with all of  this featuresbyeAlex

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Brandi Lee Kiser
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 11 year old.  Had to enable install of non allowed programs to do everything i wanted it to.  Otherwise it has been eveeythong we need.  Got 3 more of a different version for my other kids.  They love them and very affordable in compaerison to the other brands.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Javier
Reviews.Content: Good product, low price, fast shipping. Not an iPad, or even a Galaxy Tab, but to play, listen to music, read, watch videos on Youtube and check Twitter is perfect. Cons: The wireless is really poor, but you can connect a USB modem.

Reviews.Title: Tablet
Reviews.Author: Tablet
Reviews.Content: My son loves it. The only thing is i wish it came with a warranty, called coby and they told me cant provide warranty either

Reviews.Title: Kyros Instructions Lacking
Reviews.Author: Rusty57
Reviews.Content: The Kyros was purchased to try a tablet vs. my computer.  I found very little help from the instruction book.  The first unit kept declaring the SD card as damaged including a second new card.  The replacement tablet worked.  The screen keyboard was more difficult than the keyboard purchased for the tablet.  The browser is a pain.  Touching the "x" to close a window often creates another one instead, increasing the work.  The YouTube player does not have a search option like the one on a computer browser.  But the sound is surprisingly good on music videos.  The screen is not readable in bright sunlight but is fine indoors with crisp images and good color.

Reviews.Title: Good, but not perfect
Reviews.Author: Josshua
Reviews.Content: It's a very good product, a would be totally satiesfied if only the accelerometer works fine, but it doest'n, so it is a little disappointing because i can't play games like asphalt 5 or others that use that hardware.

Reviews.Title: Low resolution screen, severly lacking access to many aps
Reviews.Author: J. Cummings
Reviews.Content: Had the Coby MID7042-4 for several days and had to send it back.  Quality of display was very low resolution and could not find any decent aps for it due to not being able to access Google Play.  Am now looking for a better one in the same price range.

Reviews.Title: Coby Kyros 7-Inch Android 4.0 4 GB 16:9 Capacitive Multi-Touchscreen Widescreen Internet Tablet with Built-In Camera, Black MID
Reviews.Author: Lackqueen
Reviews.Content: Set up my Coby Kyros 7-Inch Android 4.0 today.  Had a problem with it finding my IP address but called my provider, Verizon, and within 5 minutes was on the internet.  So far I'm very satisfied with this tablet.  I mainly wanted something smaller than my laptop to surf the web, check email and play games (my favorite being Words with Friends).  I haven't used Netflix yet but will work on that tomorrow.  The battery life seems great, too.  I charged it overnight and was playing around with it for about 4 hours and still had battery life left.  So, for my few needs for a tablet, I'm very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: great quality for the price
Reviews.Author: kymmi_kim
Reviews.Content: good quality tablet at an affordable price..couldn't ask for something better, item suits its price..1 thing tho camera sucks a bit but everything else good so i can by pass that .. touch screen responds well.. tons of great free apps can be installed ,internet browsing fast , good for travelling..will be purchasing more as gifts...overall a good buy

Reviews.Title: coby kyros
Reviews.Author: nat
Reviews.Content: I bought a Coby Kyros mid7042 and I love it. For a small price, it gives greatvalue. I browse the internet, watch youtube videos, download great Free books,etc. The problems I encountered were 1) it would sometimes freeze up an I would have to press the reset button to the back 2) when searching through Aldiko for free books, the search engine would freeze and I would have to restart through all the books again. Other than those issues,the kyros is worth every dollar.

Reviews.Title: Nrowser wont play video on most web pages.
Reviews.Author: TNIC "TNic"
Reviews.Content: Perhpas somone has figured out how to view video on web pages.I tried the built in browser on HTML5 setting and Android setting. I tried  Dolphin HD. I tried downloading Adobe Flash from 1mobile.com and other flash software. The borwser just displays the flash "cube" symbol but does not play the video.If I can get the links below to work I will have a truly fantastic tablet for a low price!For instanceI can not view the video links on these pages[...][...]Can not play the live audio feed on this page[...]But I can play videos on this page.[...]I had difficulty writing to the plug in SD card (32gig).In the comments that followed my post Harvey suggested I format the plug in SD card  as exFAT on a computer and try it again. I did as he suggested and formated the card as exFAT and it worked. I can now write to the SD card seen as extsd on the coby 7042-4.Coby should include this step in their documentation and on their web site to server their customers better.Apps2SD will not move software to /extsdThe comments that follow are from my original post and may not make sense now. I revised this post to save people the trouble of searching for the answer.Thanks to all who helped and Harvey who delivered the solution.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Rivero
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality, fast performance, good quality on the screen.The price under $120 is perfect for all you get.I like how the You tube videos look so clean in the screen

Reviews.Title: Probably the best android tablet available for under $100
Reviews.Author: Monkeymaan
Reviews.Content: I set out this summer to go looking for a new tablet because I needed something that could surf the web and read pdfs in a pinch.  Anything else it could do with multimedia was just kind of a bonus to me.  Priced in the same area as a kindle touch, this thing can do a lot more.It comes loaded with the latest Android OS, 4.0.  It has a capacitive screen like all the new tablets.  4gb of built in storage, which can be easily expanded to 36 with what SD Micros, now considered cheap tech.  Adobe support (as common as it is) is always a plus for me.  It's nice to see that youtube play is advertised on the back of the box, which makes me feel a little more confident in what I purchased.And most surprisingly, this thing can hold a charge.  After 1 hour of constant internet surfing I was surprised to see my battery was still hovering around 85 percent.  I didn't really expect much considering this is where cheap tablets suffer sometimes, but Coby manages something that I feel rivals the more popular Kindle fire.Negatives.  The camera is strictly for video chat (which I haven't tested).  It's not very good quality, but who really cares when your phone probably gets better clarity anyway?  The tablet also doesn't have google play out of the box, but you can root it (which is fairly easy to do) so it does.  Someone did that for me already, but doing so requires a bit more research.  The average user may not even care, but if you want access to a larger library of apps, having google play is almost essential.  Overall though, if you're looking for a first tablet or a cheap tablet, this is probably your best option.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price.
Reviews.Author: Cherylm
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet mainly to have for vacation so I can access the internet and e-mail without having to bring my laptop.  I have used it daily since I got it and absolutely love it.  I play games, get online, receive e-mail and read Kindle e-books with the Kindle for PC program I downloaded.  I have had no issues with freezing up or any glitches.  The only thing I don't like is that I can't access google play.  However, I have found most of the same apps I wanted either through the Amazon app store or 1 Mobile Market.  The sleeve that comes with the tablet is flimsy, so I also purchased a case for it.  This makes the tablet easier and more comfortable to hold.  My kids and I have liked this tablet so much that my husband purchased one as well.  Now, we'll have two of them to keep us busy on our road trip vacation.

Reviews.Title: COBY KYROS MID7042
Reviews.Author: Cj
Reviews.Content: JUST RECEIVED MY NEW KYROS MID7042 GREAT VALUE FOR THE PRICE. THE QUALITY SEEMS TO BE COMPAREABLE TO MOST HIGHER PRICED TABLETS I'VE LOOKED AT WHILE SHOPPING. THIS IS MY SECOND KYROS I ACCIDENTLY TRIED TO CHARGE MY MID7024 WITH THE WRONG CHARGER AND ALTHOUGH IT STILL WORKS WHILE PLUGED IN THE BATTERY CAN NO LONGER BE CHARGED (NOTE TO OTHER'S "DON'T DO THAT") I LOOKED AT QUITE A FEW OTHER HIGHER PRICED TABLETS AND EXCEPT THAT SOME OF THEM CAN BE USED THRU YOUR CELLUAR SERVICE I COULD NOT JUSTIFY THE PRICE VS MY INTENDED USE.  THIS IS A VERY CAPABLE WI-FI TABLET. QUAILITY MEETS AND EXCEEDS EXPECTATIONS. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS THIS PRODUCT AND WILL ALSO REMIND YOU THIS IN NOT NOR IS IT INTENDED TO BE AN iPAD. BUT FOR THOSE OF US WHO WANT TO SURF THE NET; READ; AND PLAY GAMES TO PASS TIME IN LINE, THIS IS AN EXCEPTIONAL LITTLE TABLET.CONS: THIS IS MINOR BUT NOTICEABLE WHEN HOLDING THE TABLET, THE KYROS MID7042 NO LONGER HAS THE NICE ROUNDED CORNERS OF THE PREVIOUS MODELS SO THE EDGE AROUND THE ENTIRE TABLET IS NOTICABLY SHARP TO THE TOUCH, NOT THAT YOU WOULD GET CUT ON IT JUST THAT TO ME THE FEEL IS A BIT UNCOMFORTABLE. THIS CAN OF COURSE BE REMIDIED WITH A COVER.

Reviews.Title: Get a Galaxy Instea
Reviews.Author: GC "Scott W"
Reviews.Content: Decided to try this tablet after reading other reviews. Needed to run android app Swannview, email, and surf webb. Not alot to ask for? Email and surfing worked fine, but the Swannview app installation (and required work around because it is not recognized by Google market) was a problem (ie lots of time). Finally installed app, but kept crashing. Called customer support, completely frustrating, long wait and no help. Bought a Galaxy tablet, twice the money $250, but works flawlessly, without any pain, cant say enough about how good the Galaxy is, worth every penny.However the Amazon transaction was great, returned for credit, thanks AmazonSamsung Galaxy Tab 2 (7-Inch, Wi-Fi)

Reviews.Title: A Curse.
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: I bought this product a few months ago because I thought it would be interesting to finally own a tablet. It was, without a doubt, the worst purchase I have ever made. Not only does this tablet not receive a WiFi signal but once every 2 hours (and it only lasts for 5 minutes), but it also claims that the signal is in range but protected. Even if you have the password to your WiFi, it won't connect to it.My advise? Get an iPad. I would gladly switch to Apple products after buying this 10.1 inch flashing Android paperweight. It might cost more, but remember: Less price always means less quality.

Reviews.Title: Disgusted with this Coby customer service... read on..
Reviews.Author: Janine Wren
Reviews.Content: UPDATE: Coby Electronics is out of business!, They stole my kids tablets and my $30 money order! This company: [...] bought out parts of the company but assumes no responsibility for warranty or lost tablets. Crooks! How can anyone do such a thing to two young children? Do not buy anything COBY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Tablets stopped working correctly (from early on) sound stopped on one, apps crashed on both, stopped charging, but my boys didn't want to loose all their downloads so I hoped there would be a fix so I waited until the end of the warrantee. Finally sent them in for repair. I have proof of receipt that they received my two tablets on July 11th 2013. I insured them for $200 and included a $30 money order for return postage) (cost me $47 round trip shipping and insurance)  When I called a few days later, they said that proof was not in their system yet. I originally spoke to Mike Gabourie, he told me that they would just replace the defective ones with new ones. When I called to check as they recommended weekly, I now cannot get a response. Now Coby phone numbers don't work, no one answers, or it says mailbox full. Directs you to email which comes back undeliverable! What do I do? Help:) Class action lawsuit? anyone?

Reviews.Title: Do NOT buy this product
Reviews.Author: Amy Knickerbocker
Reviews.Content: Buying this tablet is by far the worst purchase I have ever made. It was such a waste of money! This tablet never worked properly. It has reset itself to factory settings, for no apparent reason, at least four times now. You can't download Google play or the istore on it, which limits the apps you can get by a lot. It freezes all the time and will not unfreeze without a restart. I've tried. I left it for 5 hours once and it stayed frozen the entire time. The battery doesn't hold charge for very long, and it takes forever to recharge. The camera is really crappy, and it doesn't have much memory. It doesn't like it when you play games. I've never been able to get Angry Birds to work properly on it. And don't even think about netflix or youtube or skype. It won't download netflix and if you try using the others, it will throw a complete hissy fit and won't work for days. It even has a hard time with facebook!I don't have the highest standards when it comes to electronics. I don't even have a smartphone (yet). I'm perfectly happy with middle-of-the-road stuff because I don't want to pay the high prices. But this tablet isn't even mediocre. It's abysmal. How it ever passed any sort of testing is beyond me. Take my advice. Take your money elsewhere. The low price is not worth the headache!

Reviews.Title: iIT SUCKS
Reviews.Author: Florence D Ford
Reviews.Content: I GOT THIS FOR MY GRANDSON, HE IS ALWAYS USING MY IPAD TO LOOK AT NEXFLEX SO I SAID I WOULD BY HIM A TABLET FOR CHRISTMAS.  YOU CAN'T PUT NETFLEX ON THIS IT ISN'T ENOUGH MEMORY FOR IT.

Reviews.Title: Great for kids
Reviews.Author: The Bear "Bearish"
Reviews.Content: This unit does not give you access to the Android market or Google Play for Apps.. To get those you must perform a complicated series of downloads from questionable sources..

Reviews.Title: Great while it lasted
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My Coby Kyros MID7042-4 was great for six months.  Then one day while I was gone, the angels came and took it home.  Black screen, power button doesn't wake it up, won't charge up.  Dead.  Not merely dead, really most sincerely dead.

Reviews.Title: disappointing
Reviews.Author: medic dad
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my 3 year old son so that I could have my Samsung back. I understand you get what you pay for... but I honestly don't even feel like I got my money's worth. It is built very cheaply and is very clunky in the way  it operates and works. It does not work with Netflix. I upgraded the android os, I added amazon appstore and the best I was able to do was get Netflix for a limited basis. Since this was my primary purpose for it, it did not meet my expectations. I will be spending the money to get him a Samsung tablet and it's quality.

Reviews.Title: nice machine, but worthless
Reviews.Author: puzzled
Reviews.Content: This is a nice machine, but worthless if you plan to use it to access most to the common andriod aps.  The machine will not work with Google play which is the new name for the Adroid Market.  I spent six hours going through various forums and there is no fix.  Where this comes into play is many common sources like NBC post their app's only at Google Play, so even though they offer a Andriod app, you can't use it on this machine. Google play downloads, but won't run on this machine. Save your time and money and look for one which campatible with Google Play

Reviews.Title: sent and no good.
Reviews.Author: laura
Reviews.Content: They sent it wrapped in plastic and it doesnt work...I plugged in and its been 4 hrs. and still nothing.

Reviews.Title: No permite bajar juegos de google play
Reviews.Author: Bernardo Cardenas
Reviews.Content: Esta tablet que la compre principalmente para mi hijo pequeño no permite bajar juegos de google play. Aunque existen varias paginas en donde se pueden bajar juegos android, esta tablet no es reconocida en google play.Por otro lado despues de instalarle algunos juegos se bloqueo dos veces y se borro toda la información.No estoy seguro de volver a comprar este producto

Reviews.Title: koby tablet
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: Awful...did a lot of research on this tablet before purchase. Wish I could just send it back.  Would not recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: dont buy
Reviews.Author: Matthew Paider
Reviews.Content: about 5 weeks in the screen got really hot all the time.  it began to crack.you cant even get in touch with someone at amazon to let them know about it.it's my sons and now i had to spend another $100 because he was so upsetit is not working properly.  amazing how after 30 days they say there not responsible.this is why you should not buy online.  go direct to the store!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Junk! Spend the extra money and get a Kindle!
Reviews.Author: KMB "kowabungakim"
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for our 9-year-old daughter. I charged it up and tried to upload some apps. None of the apps would load, they all kept failing. Also, the screen has poor lighting and poor pixilation - very spotty. It just feels light and cheap. Sending back right away and will just buy another Kindle for her instead.

Reviews.Title: Horrible - Don't Waste Your Money!
Reviews.Author: s&smommy
Reviews.Content: My dad got this tablet for my son's 10th birthday & from the day it arrived, it gave us nothing but problems. We were only able to download 2 games & they would freeze up after just a few minutes of play. None of the other pre-loaded apps worked either. It constantly froze no matter what you did & then after a few days it just started shutting off at random.I ended up returning the product & using Amazon credit to get another tablet that works 100x better.

Reviews.Title: Came with a defect, but worked fine otherwise
Reviews.Author: mtnbiker72
Reviews.Content: Screen had a BRIGHT white spot that showed on white screens, but not on color screens. It was distracting and started within a few hours of use. I don't know if it would get worse or not but I wasn't going to find out. I sent it back and am getting Kindle Gen 2 instead. This is the second Coby product I'm having to send back within a few days of receiving due to defects, I don't have faith in their products anymore. Too bad, it seemed to work OK otherwise and could represent a good value if they upped their quality control.

Reviews.Title: Returned
Reviews.Author: E. Miller
Reviews.Content: Returned because touch screen was not responsive and also a bigger screen was in order. Ordered another brand with larger screen and more storage.

Reviews.Title: coby kyros 7" tablet
Reviews.Author: avidreade4r
Reviews.Content: very disappointed.  am unable to order books from amazon as i thought i could.  tablet is sluggish and slow to respond.  a complete waste of time and money.

Reviews.Title: Not For Concerned Parents
Reviews.Author: HopesMom
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed when I received the Kyros tablet.  I spent over an hour trying to delete unwanted or needed apps/widgets from the screen so that my 9 year old daughter would not have access to them.  Also, spent considerable time trying to locate any parental controls for the internet.  I finally called technical support and was advised that parental controls were neither offered or available as an add-on.  If you are a concerned parent making a purchase for your child, I would not choose this tablet.  I have returned the item, spent the extra money, and purchased the KINDLE FIRE.  It is awesome and both my daughter and I love it.  So, forget the Coby and spend the extra for the Kindle.Additionally, just to clarify...yes, perhaps I should have double-checked the status of parental controls before purchasing.  I guess in this day in age I wrongly assumed that it would have been a concern that Coby would have addressed.  However, if that was not enough of a disappointment, the unit is actually very slow in its response.  Utilizing the same Wi-Fi network that I am now using with the Kindle, there is absolutely no comparison with regard to speed.  There is no way the Kyros could keep up.

Reviews.Title: not very good
Reviews.Author: RobertJ
Reviews.Content: I have not yet gotten the hdmi jack to work, so I'm not sure if it works the video instructions on the web page are not accurate for this device.

Reviews.Title: Just OK
Reviews.Author: James V. George "JVG"
Reviews.Content: the specification says 1gb or ram and 1Ghz of processor.  The device is very slow in responding.  my phone which is having the same specs responds very good.

Reviews.Title: bad
Reviews.Author: ashley derushe
Reviews.Content: not good for the a pin.I need a pin and I whet my money back now ok now ok.give me money back or I will call 911 on you.

Reviews.Title: crap
Reviews.Author: SarasotaGuy

Reviews.Title: Keep your money!
Reviews.Author: Steve Rathbun "Steve Rathbun"
Reviews.Content: This thing looks good,and is respnsive to touch,but that's all I can say good about it.It wont do any Google,Adobe,or Real Networks(Realplayer)downloads.Wont do anything requireing Adobe flashplayer(s)or reader(s).Basically,a toy.If you really want to throw out your mney,throw it my way!It is amazingly slow!I do believe a Commodore Vic-20 would out perform it!

Reviews.Title: BEWARE OF THIS TABLET
Reviews.Author: Shannyn Michele
Reviews.Content: BEWARE OF THIS TABLET!!!  JUST BECAUSE THE OPERATING SYSTEM IS ANDROID 4.0 DOES NOT MEAN THAT IT COMES WITH ANDROID APPS!!!  MATTER OF FACT, THIS ONE COMES WITH, "GETJAR!!"  GETJAR HAS FAR LESS APPS THAN "ANDROID APPS!!"  YOU WANT ANDROID APPS, NOT GETJAR, GETJAR IS BASICALLY AMAZON APPS!!

Reviews.Title: No Google Play Store Seriously?? **SAVE YOUR MONEY** **DO NOT BUY**
Reviews.Author: thabeatsociety
Reviews.Content: You cannot have a full, credible android experience without the Google Play Store. Period. This tablet does not include the android market. I knew this prior to purchasing it, but figured hey give the GetJar market a chance.Also, there is no native Google Account sync built into this device. Huh??? Hey Coby, (ehh heemm, #clearsthroat), THIS IS AN ANDROID TABLET, WHICH MEANS WHEN I System Settings > Account Sync > I EXPECT TO SEE GOOGLE ACCOUNT AS AN ACCOUNT TYPE I CAN ADD!!!!!  The only options at System Settings > Account Sync > are Corporate and Email!!! That's it! You can't natively add a Google Account for Sync and have the REAL, native Gmail app (not the browser based mobile version (insufficient!!) ?????? Seriously??But part of my anger is at Google for letting manufacturers put its beautiful, masterpiece that ICS really is on CRAP, GARBAGE HARDWARE LIKE THIS!!!!!!!!!!But the icing on the cake is that the sub-par GetJar market it does include tries to pull a jedi mind trick when you install Google mainstays like Gmail, Docs (now called Drive), etc by craftily opening the web-based mobile browser versions of those apps in-browser instead of the full on apps that you expect.  This is TRASH!  Do not buy it!P.S. the screen quality is that of my old Nintendo Game Boy when it first came out, first version. TRASH!!!!!#EPICFAIL #EPICFAIL #EPICFAIL #EPICFAIL #EPICFAIL #EPICFAIL** Returned **** Returned **** Returned **** Returned **** Save your Money**** Save your Money**** Save your Money**** DO NOT BUY **** DO NOT BUY **** DO NOT BUY **** DO NOT BUY **
